description: Change of Use of ground floor of 48 High Street to retail/financial and professional services/restaurant or cafe use(classes A1/A2/A3) and the conversion of the upper floors of this building to 4 dwellings; the erection of a part3/5/6/8 storey building to provide 70 dwellings, together with associated landscaping. amenity space, car and cycle parking
